title: The Talk Show: ‘No False Humidity’
content:
Special guest: Jason Snell. Topics: Headset, headseat, headset. And no baseball talk other than how games might look in VR. Also: Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro for iPad, and GM’s dumb decision to drop CarPlay.

Sponsored by:

  • Squarespace: Make your next move. Use code talkshow for 10% off your first order.
  • Kolide: Cross-platform endpoint security solution for teams that value privacy and transparency.
  • Backblaze: Makes backing up and accessing your data astonishingly easy.
 ★
author: John Gruber
